snippet.title: Mortal Kombat: Shaolin Monks PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
Mortal Kombat: Shaolin Monks PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: September 16, 2005
Platforms: PlayStation 2, Xbox
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: Direct3D11 (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
Internal Resolution: 8x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Mipmapping: Basic (Fast)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
_____________________________________________
(✓) Enable HW Hacks:
(✓) Half-pixel Offset: Special (Texture)
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 12GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Ultimate
_____________________________________________
Facebook » http://bit.ly/xTimelessGaming
Subscribe » http://bit.ly/Join-XTG

Please leave a comment and rate it. :)
Enjoy !
